Keys.Name: ShowCurrentAppearanceAfterCloseInventory
Keys.Description: Display the current outfit status (social type and appropriateness) as a HUD message when closing the inventory window.

Keys.Name: ShowCurrentAppearanceInCharacterSheet
Keys.Description: Display the current outfit status (social type and appropriateness) in the character's sheet.

Keys.Name: Nudity
Keys.Description: If enabled, characters without any clothing will be described as "nude". If disabled, they will be described as "wearing only underwear".

Keys.Name: EnableDressCommentsBeforeTalk
Keys.Description: If enabled, NPCs may comment on the player's clothing.

Keys.Name: EnableAmbientContextText
Keys.Description: Enable ambient context messages regarding character's outfit.

Keys.Name: AmbientContextTextFrequency
Keys.Description: Defines the minimum interval between ambient context messages.

Keys.Name: EnforceDressCodeInSensitiveAreas
Keys.Description: Displays a warning message when entering sensitive locations while dressed inappropriately.

Keys.Name: EnableDressCodeCrime
Keys.Description: If enabled, being indecent in a restricted area may trigger a legal response after a short grace period.

Keys.Name: CrimeGracePeriod
Keys.Description: Defines how many seconds the player has to dress before guards intervene. Only applies when "Enable Dress Code Crime" is active.
